sentence.Network_en: The customer fired into his body again and the counterman slumped to the floor.
sentence.Network_cn: 顾客瞄准他的身子又打了一枪,于是店员跌倒在地上.

sentence.Network_en: The counterman raised one of his arms feebly as if to protect himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 店员有气无力地抬起一只胳膊,仿佛是要进行自卫似的.
